docs.text: DVC-NLP-Projects STEP 01- Create a repository STEP 02- Clone the new repository STEP 03- Create a conda environment after opening the repository in VSCODE conda create --prefix ./env python = 3 .7 -y conda activate ./env OR source activate ./env STEP 04- install the requirements pip install -r requirements.txt STEP 05- initialize the dvc project dvc init STEP 06- commit and push the changes to the remote repository
